name: Amazon Customer
title: Sizing was incorrect
body: I’ve ordered the same product/size 2 different times and on the 2nd time, they were much much smaller.

name: Kim Rogers
title: Comfortable, but thin and short on leg
body:
These are a good price and comfortable. They will be great for summer months. However, it's important to note that they are thinner fabric and shorter on the leg than Nike socks bought from the Nike store. Don't think I'll purchase them on Amazon again.
65 year old male

name: Rachel
title: Not the color advertised
body: These are nice Nike socks but I ordered the black ones the same as the picture clearly shows and it was also supposed to be 6 pairs and this is only 3. I will keep them because they will still be used but I definitely feel like this listing needs some major corrections.

name: Christopher
title: Tiny Socks, do not recommend
body: These socks are a 2019 edition from what I read on the tag. They are super thin and are more of an ancle sock. For the same price and free shipping I bought the real ones on the nike website. The photo shows them being compared to the real sock from Nike. I would give 0 stars if possible. Guess my toddler gets some new socks.

name: GK
title: See through thin
body: These socks are so thin they are see through. No way this is original Nike.

name: Alfonso Foster
title: Comfort
body: Nice

name: Jade h.
title: DO NOT BUY
body: Terrible. Obviously- fake Nike socks. Material is way off after the first wash. I returned them

name: patricia hatch
title: Perfect socks
body: Love these socks. They fit perfectly and feel comfortable

name: Gina Fontanini
title: Fake
body: These are not cushioned or Nike socks. They are super thin and will most likely fall apart after a few washes. Very disappointed.

name: Jay
title: Great socks
body: I’m a size 8 In womens and a size M fit perfect. Nothing to complain about as these socks are normal as if I Purchased in store. Great value for 6 pairs!

name: Mike M.
title: not at all what i thought i ordered
body: socks are tiny and thin and uncomfortable, probably not authentic, total ripoff, should have known the price was too good to be true. Completely unwearable. Will return what I can.

name: Sandra Snell
title: Comfortable sock
body: Originally bought for my grandson but I ordered women’s size. I kept them for me and ordered his correct size. One of the best mistakes I ever made.

name: Mike
title: Small and scratchy
body: They are very small - I ordered size large - and scratchy/itchy, not soft at all, not comfortable to wear

name: Julia Rodriguez
title: These aren’t authentic NIKE socks!
body: Felt like the pictures scammed me to believe they were authentic but when I received the socks they came in a thin material and small nike sign.

name: R. A. Jones
title: Too thin for a crew sock
body: MUCH thinner than classic Nike crew socks. They're okay as socks and the fit is about right, but very thin. To say these are "cushion" crew socks is misrepresenting the product. I won't buy these again and if you want normal crew socks, I would advise you don't either.

name: sally k miller
title: Very satisfactory !! He liked them very much!!
body: I gave it as a gift for Christmas! He liked them very much!!! Although my only complaint was I did not receive them till after Christmas!!!

name: Katherine
title: DO NOT BUY!!! Fake!!
body: These are not real. Right sock is the one ordered in the same size of the left sock (previously owned). Beware!!!!!

name: Ann Leahy
title: Great for workouts
body: We love the quality of Nike socks for wearing under sneakers and dance shoes. Every time our old ones wear out, we purchase more knowing it to be a consistant product.

name: b
title: Does the job
body: Way thinner than I thought they would be. Not worth what u paid for them but just to cover my feet, they do the job but that’s about it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: FAKE Nikes
body: Avoid buying these counterfeit Nike socks. They are very thin and also shrink in the wash.
